title: Clave de Fá font now available in MyFonts
author: dimitre

comments.content:
Does it have an OpenType magic to support the $59 price point?

Details ( [and char set](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012143733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dimitrelima/clave-de-fa/regular/charmap.html)) look a bit sparse.

You're right, a bit sparse charset and details  
the $59 price tag is raising funds to work on that :)  
shh dont tell anyone

there is a bit of opentype work, unfortunately no magic this time  
some frequently used pair of characters are custom designed but it wont appear on MyFonts preview  
cheers
Okay, your secret's safe with me. Best of luck with it.
